model

Class ProductTransport

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.ProductTransport
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IEmployeeGroup, IObserver

    public class ProductTransport
extends java.lang.Object
implements IObserver, IEmployeeGroup, java.io.Serializable
    Manages the transport of products. Aggregates all the drivers.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • update

        public void update(IObservable warehouse)
        Gets called when a product ran out in the warehouse, starts the resupply process.
        Specified by:
        update in interface IObserver
        Parameters:
        warehouse - where the product ran out.

      • nextDay

        public void nextDay()
        Advances the day in all drivers.

      • deliver

        public void deliver(Product product)
        Starts delivery of product. If there's no available delivery driver, adds the product into queue.
        Parameters:
        product - product to be delivered.

      • resupply

        public void resupply(Product product)
        Starts the resupplying of a product. Keeps sending supply drivers until the request is taken care of or there's no available supply driver left. If there's no supply driver available adds the request to queue.
        Parameters:
        product - product to be resupplied.

      • findDriver

        public Driver findDriver(java.lang.Class<?> driverClass)
        Finds an available driver of the given class.
        Parameters:
        driverClass - class of the driver to be found.
        Returns:
        the found driver or null if no driver of given class is available.
